title: The Pond and the city
creator_credit: Knickerbocker Productions, The Conservation Foundation, Willard Van Dyke and Wheaton Galentine
brief_description: Looks at the need for conservation of natural resources. Points out that water and forest resources are not inexhaustible, but must be carefully protected. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Knickerbocker Productions, The Conservation Foundation, Willard Van Dyke and Wheaton Galentine
